post.text: Incredibly touched by this video. Our American comeback story begins November 8th. We will Make America Great Again for everyone.

comment.author: Sebastian
comment.text: Where are all my fellow AMERICAN PATRIOTS!!!!! It's time to FALL IN, TAKE UP ARMS, and TAKE BACK WHAT WE WHOLE HEARTLY WANT!!!!!!!! We want our country back. Stand and defend, your country!!!!!

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: Then change your profile RED or you are a fraud!
